Description:
Surrounded with a garden with an outdoor shower and free-to-use barbecue facilities, Apartments Orhideja is a self-catering accommodation located in Rab. Free Wi-Fi access is available and the beach is 300 metres away.

All units are air-conditioned and provide a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one comes with a fully equipped kitchen or a kitchenette, and a private bathroom with a shower. Some of units have a washing machine.

A grocery shop is 300 metres away. Various restaurants and cafe bars can be found along the coastline, with the nearest ones 300 metres away.

Description:
Set right next to the sea and 1.5 km from the Old Town of Rab, Padova Camping Resort by Valamar houses a grocery store, bar, à la carte restaurant, children playground and various entertainment activities. Free WiFi access is available and free private parking is available next to each mobile home.

Mobile homes are set under the shade of the pine trees, while a 500 metres long sandy beach stretches along the area. Equipped with air conditioning, an LCD satellite TV and a kitchen with dining area, mobile homes also include 2 showers and a toilet, as well as a furnished terrace.

Various sport opportunities, such as diving, cycling, table tennis and paragliding are provided, some at an additional cost. Quad bike and boat rental can be arranged at surcharge. There is a wellness centre in the nearby Hotel Padova.

The historic town of Rab can be reachead in a 5-minute boat ride, or a 20-minute walk. It preserves numerous churches and monasteries which guests can visit.

Main Bus Station is 1.5 km from the camp. Ferry Port with lines to Rijeka and Island of Pag is at a distance of 2.5 km. Housed in a building constructed during the Austro-Hungarian Empire with details of Art Nouveau, all rooms come with a fridge and a private bathroom. Private parking is possible on site at a surcharge.

The well-kept and spacious garden with a seating area invites guests to relax. A buffet breakfast can be organised in hotel next door at an additional cost. Ironing facilities are available upon request.

Description:
Located in an early 20th-century art-deco style palace and only steps away from the sea in Rab, Villas Arbia - Margita Beach hotel Apartments provides air-conditioned accommodation with free high-speed WiFi access. The property is surrounded by a lush Mediterranean garden and located in a quiet spot.

Apartments and studios here provide a seating area with a sofa and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each comes with a fully equipped kitchenette featuring a dining table and a fridge. The newly refurbished private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. Free toiletries are provided.

Margita Apartments - Villas Arbia comprise a sun terrace and a patio as well. A view of the sea and Rab Old town with its historic bell towers is provided in most rooms.

The property is a part of Villas Arbia integrated hotel. private parking is provided on site.

The city centre and the Rab Marina are a 5-minute walk away from the apartments. A restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine can be found within 1 km from the property. A ferry port with lines leading to Rijeka and the mainland is 1.5 km away, while hydroplane airport is set about 300 metres away. All apartments feature satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom. Some come with a furnished balcony. Guests can make use of the sun terrace and the garden with barbecue facilities.

All units are air-conditioned and offer a satellite TV, a private bathroom with a shower and a balcony that overlooks the sea. The apartment offers a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area.

Breakfast and dinner can be arranged by the owner upon request. Various restaurants can be found 500 metres from the property, while shops, cafes and bakeries can also be found 500 metres away.

Bike and boat rentals can be arranged by the owner, as well as sightseeing tours of the Old Town. Excursions to the nearby islands can also be arranged. A Wellness Centre is located 500 metres.

With sea views, Belveder Deluxe Suite and Rooms is located in Supetarska Draga and has a restaurant, room service, bar, garden, terrace and childrens playground. The bed and breakfast features both WiFi and private parking free of charge.

Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave, and a stovetop.

Belveder Deluxe Suite and Rooms provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

Hiking and fishing are possible within the area, and the accommodation offers a private beach area.

Dumici Beach is 1.2 km from Belveder Deluxe Suite and Rooms, while Supetarska Draga Beach is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Rijeka Airport, 65 km from the bed and breakfast. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
